llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Tariff-driven reorientation of supply chains and a productivity push in AI/semis/data-center infrastructure lifting ROIC and prompting capex reallocation (SGB2PAZGK)(NL5YYTLF2) | What to watch: tariff deadlines, chip/EV capex announcements, Wyoming energy-cost backdrop shaping baseload power, and ROIC trends confirming regime progression | Probability 50% (NL5YYTLF2)(SGB2PAZGK).
Up | 12–36 months | Tech leaders with durable ROIC expansion re-rating as capex accelerates in semis/AI and energy infrastructure supported by data-center buildouts and AI compute demand | What to watch: sustained ROIC expansion, capex intensity in semis/AI and energy infra, Nvidia/AI-data-center earnings cadence, and energy-demand signals | Probability 40% (65UUBU0OR)(O4ZEED2EB)(STBVARD8F).
Down | 0–3 weeks | Geopolitical shocks and shipping disruptions driving a risk-off tilt as Israel–Houthi strikes threaten Red Sea routes and shipping-cost pressure emerges | What to watch: evolving Red Sea route status, UKMTO updates, and broader risk-premia signals that would weigh on growth equities | Probability 60% (I2SJU04DF)(NBX9RA9WX).
Down | 3–6 months | Bear-case scenario where sustained escalation maintains a higher risk premium and compresses multiples for growth stocks; Shopify forward guidance and GMV trajectory under scrutiny while YouTube Music monetization momentum and Bandsintown live-event data shape near-term cash-flow expectations | What to watch: Shopify forward guidance/GMV growth, Costa/Disney/M&A cadence, and YouTube Music monetization signals via subscriber engagement and live-events integration | Probability 30% (I19NO2GMNF)(I2SJU04DF)(I11)(I12)(I3G1PVPWPD).
